title: 100 watts 120 volts
brief_description: Accompanied by the Bach “Brandonburg Concerto” played by the Munich Bach Orchestra, and two very short segments of musique concrete, this film in great detail shows the fully automated manufacture of light bulbs. Produced for Fred A. Niles Communications.
